name: Wordz
tagline: Automation framework for generating unique content from any source and posting to hundreds of CMS's hands free!
body:
### Welcome to Wordz
Updates and more information to come.

### Required Packages
urllib2, sqlite3, urllib2, wordpress_xmlrpc, json.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? send an email to hgrainger@upnorthagency.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
